short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your YouTube experience with a modern, well-implemented switch button added directly to the YouTube menu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
> Change between its built-in dark and light themes ultra-fast with just one click, either from the YouTube menu switcher or from the extension icon. 

> If you often switch themes, this extension is a perfect fit for you.
